name: Ultra Drive
description:
A short shoot 'em up I made with a 16-bit style. This is my first properly published game, so that's cool. It was made in about a week, using Godot game engine since its so easy to get a good grasp of. I'm looking forward to feedback and advice!

It's been a long time since I last worked on any projects or messed with programming at all, so I thought this could be something simple to get me back into game design. I hope to work on some much bigger projects in the near future. I'm sure there will be some bugs or oversights that still need fixing. You might experience audio crackling depending on your browser, and I'm still trying to figure out what is causing it. Though it looks like it might be something with the Godot engine itself.

(Credits to https://ansimuz.itch.io/ for the art assets and music, as well as https://gamesupply.itch.io/ for the sound effects.)
